gears.sidescroller.world.machines

Class MachineGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • gears.sidescroller.world.machines.MachineGenerator

  • public class MachineGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    The MachineGenerator is used to randomly generate machines for AreaGenerator.

    • Method Detail

      • createRandomMachineAt

        public final java.util.LinkedList<AbstractMachine> createRandomMachineAt(Area inThisArea,
                                                                         int xIdx,
                                                                         int yIdx)
        Creates one or more new machines to add to the given Area. Note that this method does not do the actual adding, and so the caller is responsible for doing so. This method must return a list, as this may return a series of ConveyorBeltSegments
        Parameters:
        inThisArea - the Area these machines should later be added to
        xIdx - the x-coordinate this new machine will be added to, measured in index-space
        yIdx - the y-coordinate this new machine will be added to, measured in index-space
        Returns:
